237 typedef enum
238 {
239   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_INVALID,
240   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_STRING,
241   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_STRDUP,
242   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_BOOLEAN,
243   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_TRISTATE,
244 
245   G_MARKUP_COLLECT_OPTIONAL = (1 << 16)
246 } GMarkupCollectType;
247
